name: Candy Maiden

trigger.text: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

text: Main DON!!-1: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, turn all of your Life cards face-down.

effect.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. Then, turn all of your Life cards face-down.
Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
